CustomField.description: Looks for critical outstanding items during initial phases of implementation
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(Ubiquity_Plan_Documents_Signed__c), "Docs Not Signed" + BR(),"") & IF( ISNULL(Kotapay_Client_Signed__c) && CONTAINS(TEXT(Custodian__c), "Schwab") ,"KotaPay Not Signed" + BR(), "") & IF(ISNULL( Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c ), "Client Hasn't Completed Census" + BR(), "") & IF( (ISPICKVAL( Service_Option__c, "Simply Retirement Unbundled") && ISNULL( SPD_Uploaded__c )),"SPD Not Uploaded" + BR(), "") & IF( (ISPICKVAL( Business_Unit__c , "Simply Retirement") && NOT(ISPICKVAL(X3_38__c,"OneDigital")) && (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity_Name__r.LeadSourceDetail__c, "Simply Direct")) || Opportunity_Name__r.Advisor_Linked__c ) && Credentialed_Advisor__c =False),"Advisor Not Credentialed" + BR(), "") & IF(NOT(ISNULL( Document_Correction__c)) && ISNULL( Received_Signed_Document_Correction__c ), "Missing Signed Document Correction", "")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Looks for critical outstanding items during initial phases of implementation
CustomField.label: Outstanding Items
